mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into collect (id, user_id, title, url, logo_url, type_id, is_delete, create_time, modify_time, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update collect set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo_url = #{logoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, title, url, logo_url, type_id, is_delete, create_time, modify_time, description from collect where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, user_id, title, url, logo_url, type_id, is_delete, create_time, modify_time, description from collect
